sentences.en: "State-owned industries will always perform poorly," John Moore informed readers.
sentences.cn: “国有企业经营不善将是常态，”约翰·穆尔告诉读者。

sentences.en: Chenier and the band are performing at the Silver Palace tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 车尼尔和乐队明天将在银宫演出。

sentences.en: Fraser did not perform until after inter-mission.
sentences.cn: 弗雷泽直到中场休息之后才上场。

sentences.en: He can perform an astonishing variety of acts, including mime and juggling.
sentences.cn: 他能表演好几种令人惊叹的把戏，包括哑剧和玩杂耍。

sentences.en: He has taught his dog to perform some clever tricks.
sentences.cn: 他已经训练他的狗玩几样灵巧的把戏了.

sentences.en: I have a duty to perform.
sentences.cn: 我有一种义务要尽.

sentences.en: Irene is so incredibly musical and has a natural instinct to perform.
sentences.cn: 艾琳有着极高的音乐天分和天生的表演才能。

sentences.en: It is the obligation of citizens to perform military service.
sentences.cn: 服兵役是每个公民的义务.

sentences.en: Semiconductor devices can perform a variety of control functions in electronic equipment.
sentences.cn: 半导体器件在电子设备中能起各式各样的控制作用.

sentences.en: She is putting on powder, ready to perform on the stage.
sentences.cn: 她在搽粉, 准备登台演出.

sentences.en: She was fired for not performing the duties outlined in her contract.
sentences.cn: 由于没有履行合同中规定的职责，她被解雇了。

sentences.en: Surgeons performed an emergency operation.
sentences.cn: 外科医生做了一个急诊手术。

sentences.en: Surgeons performed an emergency operation. ＃
sentences.cn: 外科医生做了一个急诊手术。

sentences.en: That notary is authorised to perform the certain legal functions.
sentences.cn: 公证人被授权执行某些法律职能.

sentences.en: The children always perform a nativity play every Christmas.
sentences.cn: 每年圣诞节孩子们都演耶稣诞生的戏剧.

sentences.en: The children perform two plays each school year.
sentences.cn: 孩子们一学年表演两部话剧。

sentences.en: The doctor contemplated the difficult operation he had to perform.
sentences.cn: 医生仔细地考虑他所要做的棘手的手术.

sentences.en: The leadership cannot be expected to perform miracles (= improve a situation in a way that seems impossible ) .
sentences.cn: 不要指望这个领导班子能化腐朽为神奇。

sentences.en: The official opening ceremony was performed by Princess Margaret.
sentences.cn: 官方开幕式由玛 格丽特公主主持。

sentences.en: They felt continual pressure to perform well.
sentences.cn: 他们不断感受到压力，促使他们好好表演。

sentences.en: When there's snow and ice, how's this car going to perform?
sentences.cn: 路面有冰雪时，这种汽车性能如何？

sentences.en: You'll never get an encore if you perform like that!
sentences.cn: 你要照这样表演下去,永远不会有观众要你加演!

trans.tran_cn: 执行，起…作用，演出，表现（好 / 不好）
trans.tran_en: to do something, especially something difficult or useful

trans.tran_cn: 做， 履行， 完成； 表演， 演出； 工作情况， 表现
trans.tran_en: to do something to entertain people, for example by acting a play or playing a piece of music
to do something to entertain people, for example by acting a play or playing a piece of music
